ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

There is a new survey for the shadowknight community.

Hey guys, this is the list owner, Aminal. I play on the Rellos Zek server. I am a TSK named Bayln. Its just my opinion, but I think the Rellos Zek
server suits the Shadow Knights very well. U can really play out the sk char, heh.

But, that is only my opinion, and I would like to see what server you guys are playing on, so please reply to this server! Thanks, Aminal

P.S. If your server is not on the list, I apologize, just click on other servers.

----

Possible answers are:

o Rellos Zek (PVP)
o Xegony
o Fenin Ro
o Tarew Marr
o The Rathe
o Solusek Ro
o Tunare
o Karana
o Test Server
o Other Servers


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://www.onelist.com/surveycenter/shadowknight


Thanks!

shadowknight Owner
